pages.text: $(italic)This inconspicuous plant grows in the deepest depths of the oceans, forever untouched by human influence.$(br)They grow a single blossom, which slowly develops into a filigree shaped seed.$()$(br2)Mermaids Brushes can be harvested using shears.
Fully grown, these hollow seeds float to the surface of the sea to be carried away by the soft waves.$(br2)Mermaids Gems have a strong bond with water - obviously.
$(italic)这种不起眼的植物生长在海洋最深处，永远不受人类影响。$(br)它们长出一朵花，慢慢地长成花丝状的种子。$()$(br2)美人鱼刷可以用剪刀收割。
这些中空的种子长得很好，漂浮在海面上，被柔软的波浪带走。$(br2)显然，美人鱼宝石与水有很强的结合力。
